segments.text: I notice the little boy is stretching way too far to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s about to lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink has no idea what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless these kids are being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy even realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching, not even trying to help stabilize the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to get hurt if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR
